This Tildy Sharp,"},{"lineNumber":25316,"originalJapaneseLine":"　獲物を前に舌なめずりするほど","translatedEnglishLine":"is not so vulgar as to lick her lips before her prey."},{"lineNumber":25317,"originalJapaneseLine":"　下品ではありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"I am not so crude."},{"lineNumber":25318,"originalJapaneseLine":"「強い……ですね、たぶん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Strong... probably..."},{"lineNumber":25319,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ。油断はしないよう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes. Don't let your guard down."},{"lineNumber":25320,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一軍を相手にするつもりで」","translatedEnglishLine":"Act as if facing the main army."},{"lineNumber":25321,"originalJapaneseLine":"油断などという言葉から無縁な男が、","translatedEnglishLine":"A man unfamiliar with the word 'carelessness'"},{"lineNumber":25322,"originalJapaneseLine":"前に踏み出る。","translatedEnglishLine":"steps forward."},{"lineNumber":25323,"originalJapaneseLine":"「援護に回ります。お気を付けて……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will provide support. Please be careful...!"},{"lineNumber":25324,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様らを全て粛正する！","translatedEnglishLine":"I will purge all of you!"},{"lineNumber":25325,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さすれば儂が完璧である事、何ひとつ揺るがぬ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then nothing will shake the fact that I am perfect!"},{"lineNumber":25326,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ラアアアアァァァァァァッッ――……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Raaaaaahhhhhh――…!"},{"lineNumber":25327,"originalJapaneseLine":"「左翼、第3陣を退かせよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Left wing, withdraw the 3rd formation!"},{"lineNumber":25328,"originalJapaneseLine":"　変わって第4陣へ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Switch to the 4th formation!"},{"lineNumber":25329,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく、キリがないぞ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"Good grief, this is endless...!"},{"lineNumber":25330,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつになったら終わるんだ、これは……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"When will this ever end...!"},{"lineNumber":25331,"originalJapaneseLine":"引いては押し、押しては引き。","translatedEnglishLine":"Pulling back, then pushing forward, pushing then retreating."},{"lineNumber":25332,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは、夜が更けても変わらない。","translatedEnglishLine":"This did not change even as night fell."},{"lineNumber":25333,"originalJapaneseLine":"幾度とない攻勢を、リーザス軍は凌ぎ続けていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Leazas army kept enduring countless assaults."},{"lineNumber":25334,"originalJapaneseLine":"兵たちも交代で休ませてはいるが、疲労の色が濃い。","translatedEnglishLine":"The soldiers took turns resting, but the signs of exhaustion were clear."},{"lineNumber":25335,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここで引いてはなりません！","translatedEnglishLine":"We must not retreat now!"},{"lineNumber":25336,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リア様をお守りし……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Protect Lady Ria...!"},{"lineNumber":25337,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マリス殿、ご無事で」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Maris, you are safe."},{"lineNumber":25338,"originalJapaneseLine":"「エクス将軍！　白の軍が、ここまで……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"General Ex! The White Army has come this far...!"},{"lineNumber":25339,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いくらか部隊を割いて、ですが。","translatedEnglishLine":"We allocated some units for that, though."},{"lineNumber":25340,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ま、白の軍は分割行動が多いので」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, the White Army often operates in divided groups."},{"lineNumber":25341,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":25342,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さて、上手くいけば、そろそろ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, if all goes well, soon..."},{"lineNumber":25343,"originalJapaneseLine":"その時。","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment."},{"lineNumber":25344,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場の最前線でわっと声が上がった。","translatedEnglishLine":"A sudden shout arose on the front line of the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":25345,"originalJapaneseLine":"「来たか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Have they come!"},{"lineNumber":25346,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……何がです？」","translatedEnglishLine":"...What?"},{"lineNumber":25347,"originalJapaneseLine":"騒ぎの中心になったのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"At the center of the commotion was,"},{"lineNumber":25348,"originalJapaneseLine":"一人の赤の軍の兵士だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"a single soldier of the Red Army."},{"lineNumber":25349,"originalJapaneseLine":"正確には、その男が抱えていた……異形の首ひとつ。","translatedEnglishLine":"To be precise, the grotesque head he was holding."},{"lineNumber":25350,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、っ……大将軍！　魔物大将軍ヨシフ、","translatedEnglishLine":"G-Grande General! Monster Grand General Yosif,"},{"lineNumber":25351,"originalJapaneseLine":"　赤き死神が討ち取ったああああアアァァァァ！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"The Red Death God has slain himmmmmmm!!!"},{"lineNumber":25352,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦の渦中に放り込まれたヨシフの首級が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Yosif's severed head, cast into the heart of battle,"},{"lineNumber":25353,"originalJapaneseLine":"まるでプチハニー爆弾のように","translatedEnglishLine":"like a petit honey bomb,"},{"lineNumber":25354,"originalJapaneseLine":"周囲の人間を追い散らした。","translatedEnglishLine":"scattered the people around it."},{"lineNumber":25355,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、っ…………？","translatedEnglishLine":"Eh...?"},{"lineNumber":25356,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝った、のか……？　俺たち……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Did we... win...? Us...?"},{"lineNumber":25357,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ……？　あ、よ、ヨシフ様、が…………？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh...? Lo-Lord Yosif... ?"},

{"lineNumber":25358,"originalJapaneseLine":"両軍とも、どう反応すればいいか分からず、","translatedEnglishLine":"Both armies didn't know how to react,"},

{"lineNumber":25359,"originalJapaneseLine":"動きが止まる。","translatedEnglishLine":"and their movements halted."},

{"lineNumber":25360,"originalJapaneseLine":"「敵首魁は潰えた！　この戦、儂らの勝ちじゃ！","translatedEnglishLine":"The enemy leader is crushed! This battle is ours!"},

{"lineNumber":25361,"originalJapaneseLine":"　鬨をあげぇぇぇぇぇぃ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Raise the war cryyyyyy!!"},

{"lineNumber":25362,"originalJapaneseLine":"その周辺の者の頭が真っ白になったところに","translatedEnglishLine":"As those around were stunned into blankness,"},

{"lineNumber":25363,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレスの一喝が走って、","translatedEnglishLine":"Bares's shout struck through,"},

{"lineNumber":25364,"originalJapaneseLine":"半ば反射的に、戦いの趨勢は反転した。","translatedEnglishLine":"And almost reflexively, the tide of battle reversed."},

{"lineNumber":25365,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ……ま、負けた！　負けちまった……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph... we've... lost! We lost...!"},

{"lineNumber":25366,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ヨ、ヨシフ様が！？　馬鹿な、何故……！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lo-Lord Yosif!? Impossible, why...!?"},

{"lineNumber":25367,"originalJapaneseLine":"「や、やはりもう、決着はついていたのです！","translatedEnglishLine":"I-It was already decided after all!"},

{"lineNumber":25368,"originalJapaneseLine":"　進言した通りに撤退すれば……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"If only we had retreated as advised...!"},

{"lineNumber":25369,"originalJapaneseLine":"「も、も、もうだめなんだヨ！","translatedEnglishLine":"I-It, it’s already no good!"},

{"lineNumber":25370,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このままでは皆殺しだヨ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"If this continues, we'll all be slaughtered!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 往生際の悪い……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The will to live is relentless...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気を抜かないの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't let your guard down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エクス将軍も、ここに全てがかかっていると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Ex also said that everything rests on this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言っていたでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Didn't he?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分かっておりますわ。このチルディ・シャープ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand. This Tildy Sharp,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 獲物を前に舌なめずりするほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is not so vulgar as to lick her lips before her prey.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 下品ではありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am not so crude.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「強い……ですね、たぶん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Strong... probably...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ。油断はしないよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes. Don't let your guard down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一軍を相手にするつもりで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Act as if facing the main army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 油断などという言葉から無縁な男が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A man unfamiliar with the word 'carelessness'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前に踏み出る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: steps forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「援護に回ります。お気を付けて……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will provide support. Please be careful...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様らを全て粛正する！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will purge all of you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすれば儂が完璧である事、何ひとつ揺るがぬ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then nothing will shake the fact that I am perfect!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ラアアアアァァァァァァッッ――……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Raaaaaahhhhhh――…!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「左翼、第3陣を退かせよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Left wing, withdraw the 3rd formation!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変わって第4陣へ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Switch to the 4th formation!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、キリがないぞ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good grief, this is endless...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつになったら終わるんだ、これは……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When will this ever end...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引いては押し、押しては引き。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pulling back, then pushing forward, pushing then retreating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは、夜が更けても変わらない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This did not change even as night fell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幾度とない攻勢を、リーザス軍は凌ぎ続けていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Leazas army kept enduring countless assaults.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵たちも交代で休ませてはいるが、疲労の色が濃い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldiers took turns resting, but the signs of exhaustion were clear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここで引いてはなりません！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must not retreat now!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア様をお守りし……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Protect Lady Ria...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マリス殿、ご無事で」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Maris, you are safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「エクス将軍！　白の軍が、ここまで……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Ex! The White Army has come this far...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いくらか部隊を割いて、ですが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We allocated some units for that, though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、白の軍は分割行動が多いので」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, the White Army often operates in divided groups.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、上手くいけば、そろそろ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, if all goes well, soon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場の最前線でわっと声が上がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A sudden shout arose on the front line of the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「来たか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have they come!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……何がです？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...What?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 騒ぎの中心になったのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the center of the commotion was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人の赤の軍の兵士だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a single soldier of the Red Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正確には、その男が抱えていた……異形の首ひとつ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To be precise, the grotesque head he was holding.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、っ……大将軍！　魔物大将軍ヨシフ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: G-Grande General! Monster Grand General Yosif,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤き死神が討ち取ったああああアアァァァァ！！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Red Death God has slain himmmmmmm!!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦の渦中に放り込まれたヨシフの首級が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yosif's severed head, cast into the heart of battle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるでプチハニー爆弾のように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: like a petit honey bomb,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲の人間を追い散らした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: scattered the people around it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝った、のか……？　俺たち……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did we... win...? Us...?
Huh...? Lo-Lord Yosif... ?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両軍とも、どう反応すればいいか分からず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both armies didn't know how to react,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動きが止まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and their movements halted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敵首魁は潰えた！　この戦、儂らの勝ちじゃ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The enemy leader is crushed! This battle is ours!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鬨をあげぇぇぇぇぇぃ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Raise the war cryyyyyy!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その周辺の者の頭が真っ白になったところに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As those around were stunned into blankness,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスの一喝が走って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bares's shout struck through,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 半ば反射的に、戦いの趨勢は反転した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And almost reflexively, the tide of battle reversed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ……ま、負けた！　負けちまった……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph... we've... lost! We lost...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヨ、ヨシフ様が！？　馬鹿な、何故……！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lo-Lord Yosif!? Impossible, why...!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や、やはりもう、決着はついていたのです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-It was already decided after all!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 進言した通りに撤退すれば……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If only we had retreated as advised...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「も、も、もうだめなんだヨ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-It, it’s already no good!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままでは皆殺しだヨ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If this continues, we'll all be slaughtered!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The will to live is relentless...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気を抜かないの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't let your guard down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エクス将軍も、ここに全てがかかっていると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Ex also said that everything rests on this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言っていたでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Didn't he?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分かっておりますわ。このチルディ・シャープ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand. This Tildy Sharp,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 獲物を前に舌なめずりするほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is not so vulgar as to lick her lips before her prey.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 下品ではありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am not so crude.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「強い……ですね、たぶん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Strong... probably...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ。油断はしないよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes. Don't let your guard down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一軍を相手にするつもりで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Act as if facing the main army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 油断などという言葉から無縁な男が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A man unfamiliar with the word 'carelessness'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前に踏み出る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: steps forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「援護に回ります。お気を付けて……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will provide support. Please be careful...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様らを全て粛正する！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will purge all of you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすれば儂が完璧である事、何ひとつ揺るがぬ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then nothing will shake the fact that I am perfect!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ラアアアアァァァァァァッッ――……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Raaaaaahhhhhh――…!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「左翼、第3陣を退かせよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Left wing, withdraw the 3rd formation!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変わって第4陣へ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Switch to the 4th formation!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、キリがないぞ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good grief, this is endless...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつになったら終わるんだ、これは……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When will this ever end...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引いては押し、押しては引き。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pulling back, then pushing forward, pushing then retreating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは、夜が更けても変わらない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This did not change even as night fell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幾度とない攻勢を、リーザス軍は凌ぎ続けていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Leazas army kept enduring countless assaults.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵たちも交代で休ませてはいるが、疲労の色が濃い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldiers took turns resting, but the signs of exhaustion were clear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここで引いてはなりません！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must not retreat now!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア様をお守りし……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Protect Lady Ria...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マリス殿、ご無事で」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Maris, you are safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「エクス将軍！　白の軍が、ここまで……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Ex! The White Army has come this far...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いくらか部隊を割いて、ですが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We allocated some units for that, though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、白の軍は分割行動が多いので」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, the White Army often operates in divided groups.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、上手くいけば、そろそろ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, if all goes well, soon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場の最前線でわっと声が上がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A sudden shout arose on the front line of the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「来たか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have they come!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……何がです？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...What?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 騒ぎの中心になったのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the center of the commotion was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人の赤の軍の兵士だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a single soldier of the Red Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正確には、その男が抱えていた……異形の首ひとつ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To be precise, the grotesque head he was holding.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、っ……大将軍！　魔物大将軍ヨシフ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: G-Grande General! Monster Grand General Yosif,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤き死神が討ち取ったああああアアァァァァ！！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Red Death God has slain himmmmmmm!!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦の渦中に放り込まれたヨシフの首級が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yosif's severed head, cast into the heart of battle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるでプチハニー爆弾のように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: like a petit honey bomb,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲の人間を追い散らした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: scattered the people around it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝った、のか……？　俺たち……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did we... win...? Us...?
Huh...? Lo-Lord Yosif... ?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両軍とも、どう反応すればいいか分からず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both armies didn't know how to react,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動きが止まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and their movements halted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敵首魁は潰えた！　この戦、儂らの勝ちじゃ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The enemy leader is crushed! This battle is ours!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鬨をあげぇぇぇぇぇぃ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Raise the war cryyyyyy!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その周辺の者の頭が真っ白になったところに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As those around were stunned into blankness,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスの一喝が走って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bares's shout struck through,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 半ば反射的に、戦いの趨勢は反転した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And almost reflexively, the tide of battle reversed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ……ま、負けた！　負けちまった……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph... we've... lost! We lost...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヨ、ヨシフ様が！？　馬鹿な、何故……！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lo-Lord Yosif!? Impossible, why...!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や、やはりもう、決着はついていたのです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-It was already decided after all!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 進言した通りに撤退すれば……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If only we had retreated as advised...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「も、も、もうだめなんだヨ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-It, it’s already no good!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままでは皆殺しだヨ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If this continues, we'll all be slaughtered!
